room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: We couldn't have picked a better place for our first Escape experience! The associates were all incredibly friendly, helpful and engaging, and we were paired with wonderful people, which made it that much better. Prison Break was so much fun, and we can't wait to try the other games. If you're in Pigeon Forge and looking for a fun family activity or a great team builder, there's no place I could recommend to you more than The Escape Game - we'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: The Prison Break was amazing and having Carson made it even that much more fun!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: What a great time breaking out of prison! Our family is looking forward to visiting on the next trip down here to Pigeon Forge. We didn't make it out, but got really close! Next time maybe! Great staff, very friendly and fun for anyone and everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: Most incredible experience me and my fiance have ever experienced! I've played the online escape games and i never thought something like this in real life could be so in depth. A must for everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Pigeon Forge in Pigeon Forge
review: A unique vacation experience! Definitely worth the time and money- great staff, and a fun scenario! We did "Prison Break" with 6 friends and I recommend going with people you know, for sure! We loved it!
